description.compact: if you want to implement rules around selecting specific payment gateways for specific orders then you need to extend this class and add the following to mysite/_config/config.yml: Injector: EcommercePaymentSupportedMethodsProvider: class: MyCustom_EcommercePaymentSupportedMethodsProvider
this method returns an associative array of payment methods available for the current order.
returns the order to use.... You can provide one which basically just checks that it is a real order
